org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.xds.core.transform.hl7

Class DateTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openehealth.ipf.commons.ihe.xds.core.transform.hl7.DateTransformer

  • public class DateTransformer
extends Object
    Transfers between HL7 DTM timestamps used in IHE XDS profiles and DateTime.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DateTransformer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.joda.time.DateTime fromHL7(String timestamp)
      Converts from the HL7 DTM format to DateTime.
      static String toHL7(org.joda.time.DateTime dateTime)
      Converts from DateTime to the HL7 DTM format.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DateTransformer

        public DateTransformer()

    • Method Detail

      • fromHL7

        public static org.joda.time.DateTime fromHL7(String timestamp)
        Converts from the HL7 DTM format to DateTime.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - String of the pattern YYYY[MM[DD[HHMM[SS[.S[S[S[S]]]]]]]][+/-ZZZZ].
        Returns:
        DateTime object, or null is the parameter was null.

      • toHL7

        public static String toHL7(org.joda.time.DateTime dateTime)
        Converts from DateTime to the HL7 DTM format. According to IHE requirements, time zone is UTC, and milliseconds are not used.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - DateTime object.
        Returns:
        String of the pattern YYYYMMDDhhmmss.
